titles.title: SALT Deduction Fairness Act
SALT Deduction Fairness Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on the amount individuals filing jointly can deduct for certain State and local taxes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
SALT Deduction Fairness Act
This bill increases the limitation on the deduction for state and local taxes to $20,000 for individuals filing a joint tax return. The limitation applies to taxable years 2018 through 2025.
